segments.text: I notice the boy is really stretching to reach that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's standing on a stool that looks like it's about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the girl waiting patiently for a cookie, her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy seems determined to get those cookies, no matter the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the stool is going to tip, and he's going to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so hopeful, watching the boy's every move.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the cookie jar is almost full, tempting the boy to reach further.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's plate is ready to catch any cookies that come his way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will notice them before the stool tips over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's balance is so precarious; it's making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he gets down safely without falling.
segments.speaker: PAR
